sections.title: Who I Am
content: I'm Tian Pretorius, a Software Engineer with over 5 years of hands-on experience in automation, systems design, and full-stack development. My work has centered on crafting scalable solutions that integrate hardware and software, from image analysis tools using Python and OpenCV to Bluetooth-enabled RFID prototypes with cross-platform mobile and web apps.

I've led R&D initiatives tackling challenges like adoption barriers in tracking technologies and digital security protocols, always prioritizing compliant, efficient architectures. Whether optimizing production workflows or developing regulatory-focused applications, I thrive on turning complex problems into robust, impactful tech.

sections.title: What I Do
sections.intro: I specialize in building robust, scalable web applications and architecting systems that can handle growth. My focus is on:
list: Full-stack development (Python, Java, C#, HTML, CSS, JS, Django)
Database design and SQL for scalable data management
System architecture, scalability, and secure protocol implementation
R&D prototyping, from embedded systems to compliant automation tools
Technical leadership, cross-functional collaboration, and problem-solving in dynamic environments

sections.title: My Journey
content: My engineering path began in academia, where I dove into computer and electronic engineering, building a strong foundation in embedded systems, programming, and data analytics. This sparked my passion for creating solutions that connect the physical and digital worlds—whether through IoT-enabled designs or data-driven efficiencies that support decisions in fast-paced industries.

From there, I've progressed through roles in R&D and technical leadership, prototyping innovative hardware-software hybrids like mobile RFID readers and developing full-lifecycle software for compliance and automation. Highlights include crafting particle recognition algorithms for precision testing and optimizing scalable production systems. Now, with 5+ years under my belt, I'm primarily seeking to channel this expertise into a collaborative software engineering role, while honing my skills through personal projects. Let's chat about how I can help tackle your team's next big challenge.

items.title: CTO & Software Engineer

items.title: Computer/Solution Engineer
items.description: Developed automation for micronutrient blends and quality assurance systems; implemented digital security and international compliance; provided R&D support, system development, and technical procurement.

items.title: Lead/R&D Engineer
items.description: Developed vitamin testing platforms, including a sophisticated particle recognition algorithm using OpenCV, Python, and Java for Android to detect vitamin A in sugar crystals; deployed software to web-based (full stack) and mobile-based (Android/Java) platforms; bridged academic research with industrial applications.

currentFocus.description: Actively seeking software engineering opportunities where I can leverage my full-stack expertise and R&D background to build high-impact systems. Open to roles in automation, web/mobile development, or system architecture.

aboutPreview.intro: As a software engineer with 5+ years of experience in automation, analytics, systems design, and full-stack development, I've delivered impactful solutions across diverse technical industries. Highlights include leading automated tool development for food fortification, regulatory compliance, optimizing production workflows for efficiency, and engineering web- and mobile-based applications integrated with Python and OpenCV for high-precision particle analysis in industry use cases.
paragraphs: My background encompasses end-to-end R&D — from prototyping hardware-software integrations like Bluetooth-enabled RFID systems with cross-platform apps, to implementing secure protocols and scalable architectures that ensure robust performance. I've consistently bridged theoretical concepts with practical implementations, fostering collaboration to create efficient, adaptable tech that drives operational success in dynamic environments.

Driven by a love for solving complex problems through clean, scalable code, I'm enthusiastic about joining a team where I can apply my technical depth and collaborative spirit to innovative projects. Let's connect to talk about how my skills in system architecture and development can help elevate your engineering efforts.
